function.body:

BEGIN --BODY FOR cur_invoicelinetax IN ( SELECT c_invoicelinetax_id, c_tax_id FROM c_invoicelinetax WHERE c_invoiceline_id = p_invoiceline_id AND c_tax_id = (SELECT tb.c_tax_id FROM c_tax tb WHERE tb.c_taxbase_id = p_tax_id) ) LOOP UPDATE c_invoicelinetax SET taxbaseamt = taxbaseamt + p_diff_amount WHERE c_invoicelinetax_id = cur_invoicelinetax.c_invoicelinetax_id; C_INVOICELINETAX_ROUNDING_AMT(p_invoiceline_id, cur_invoicelinetax.c_tax_id, p_diff_amount); END LOOP; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN v_ResultStr:= '@ERROR=' || SQLERRM; DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(v_ResultStr) ; RAISE; END C_INVOICELINETAX_ROUNDING_AMT
